string.text: A simple small backpack, made of not very high quality materials. \n ------------------------------------------------------- \n%c[255,1,255,255]•%c[default] Additional capacity: +10 kg

The usual tourist backpack. Made of quality materials that will last a long time. 
 ------------------------------------------------------- 
%c[255,1,255,255]•%c[default] Color: olive 
%c[255,1,255,255]•%c[default] Additional capacity: +20 kg.

The usual tourist backpack. Made of quality materials that will last a long time. 
 ------------------------------------------------------- 
%c[255,1,255,255]•%c[default] Color: black 
%c[255,1,255,255]•%c[default] Additional capacity: +20 kg.

Durable field bag. Made of very high quality materials, which allows the soldier to operate in all conditions. \n ------------------------------------------------------- \n%c[255,1,255,255]•%c[default] Additional capacity: +40 kg.

Durable backpack. Contains a large amount of additional pouches that allows you to move a lot of things. \n ------------------------------------------------------- \n%c[255,1,255,255]•%c[default] Additional capacity: +60 kg.
